item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, April 16, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:

3. Markov Chain Monte Carlo Without All the Bullshit (2015) (81 points | 13 comments)

25. The case of the UI thread that hung in a kernel call (121 points | 32 comments)
26. Hacking the Postgres wire protocol (193 points | 46 comments)
27. Chroma: Ubisoft's internal tool used to simulate color-blindness (206 points | 59 comments)
28. Whistleblower details how DOGE may have taken sensitive NLRB data (879 points | 417 comments)
29. Fake images that fooled the world (116 points | 53 comments)
30. Liquid: Language models are scalable and unified multi-modal generators (72 points | 6 comments)
